# epilot-entity_schema (Data Source)

Schema DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "epilot-entity_schema" "my_schema" {
  id   = "40e4555a-5847-44ab-aa0e-6b0d6f8ad7ac"
  slug = "contact"
}
```
